protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

error.title: number of messages resulting in error

id.title: external object identifier (cs-string, no spaces or tabs)

size.title: requested page size, valid value between 1-100 rows (default 100)

next_token.title: next page token, when empty there are no more pages to fetch

parameters.description: requested page size, valid value between 1-100 rows (default 100)
parameters.name: page.size

get.description: Returns object graph from anchor to subject or object.

parameters.description: return graph paths for each result
parameters.name: explain

parameters.description: When If-None-Match is set, and includes the currnet manifest etag, the response is 304 Not Modified.
parameters.name: If-None-Match

parameters.description: When If-Match is set, and different from the current manifest etag, the response is 412 Precondition Failed.
parameters.name: If-Match

412.description: Precondition Failed. The current manifest etag is different from the If-Match header.

parameters.description: delete object relations, both object and subject relations.
parameters.name: with_relations

get.description: Returns single object instance, optionally with relations.

parameters.description: requested page size, valid value between 1-100 rows (default 100)
parameters.name: page.size

parameters.description: requested page size, valid value between 1-100 rows (default 100)
parameters.name: page.size

get.description: Returns single relation instance, optionally with objects.

parameters.description: only return relations that do not have a subject relation.
parameters.name: with_empty_subject_relation

parameters.name: page.size
